summary: A compelling account of Juan Pujol, an extraordinary Spanish double agent during WWII who helped change the course of history.
cast: Rupert Allason|José Antonio Escoriza|Aline Griffith|Juan Kreisler|Joan Pujol|Joan Miquel Pujol|Mark Seaman|Xavier Vinader|Stan Vranckx
title: Garbo: El espía
